channel.title: Update your integration :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Releasing new versions of your app Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Why is this here?: At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Missing information from the app providers on their new versions SP Software version info Page type: Navigation

item.title: Update an SSO OIDC integration with OIN Wizard
item.description: Update an SSO OIDC integration with OIN Wizard Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Saas Builder Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/submit-oin-app/ (Update your integration) Page type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.

item.title: Update a service app integration
item.description: Update a service app integration Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Page type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. They tend to walk the reader through administrative tasks but not exclusively. They might include code snippets such as API requests and responses, or outline how to develop the required solution but without walking through the majority of the code required to implement it.
